sentences.sContent: Now that we're in Europe we ought to visit the Netherlands.
sentences.sCn: 既然我们到了欧洲，就应当去荷兰。

sentences.sContent: So to come back to your question if the Netherlands inspired me in what I do.
sentences.sCn: 回到你的问题上：荷兰大地是否赋予了我艺术创作的灵感？

phrases.pCn: 荷属安的列斯；荷属安的列斯群岛（拉丁美洲群岛）

trans.tranOther: A country in western Europe, on the North Sea
